Message: The user completes the submission of the form
hi, is there anyway to lift the 20mb limit for video ads? all of our videos are under 60 seconds, but around 60mb

Hey there! Currently, NewsBreak has a 20MB limit for video ads, and unfortunately, this limit cannot be lifted. You might want to consider compressing your videos to fit within the size requirement while maintaining quality. If you need any tips on how to do that or have other questions, feel free to ask!

Thanks for your interest! At this time, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, no worries — our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. In the meantime, feel free to check out our Help Center — it’s a great resource for quick answers if you don’t need to reach out to support directly. And don’t forget to subscribe to our email updates and keep an eye out for our monthly webinar training sessions! Let us know if you’d like assistance getting started.
i had a rep, but skype was disconntinued and i dont have their emails

Oh no, sorry to hear about the Skype issue! If you had a dedicated account manager before, you can reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance. They should be able to help reconnect you with your account manager or provide further guidance.

I understand the situation with Skype being discontinued. Unfortunately, I don't have access to individual account manager contact details like email addresses. I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance in reconnecting with your account representative or getting further help.

To grant access to your team, you can follow these steps: 
1. Go to Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization or Ad account.
3. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and their role (Admin, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.
Once submitted, the new user will receive an email to verify their account and will see your Organization or Ad account listed under their Account Management tab. 
For more details, you can check out this guide: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
